reuters.title: TEKTRONIX INC 3RD QTR SHR 48 CTWS VS 39 CTS
reuters.body: FCS Laboratories Inc said George D. Fowle Jr has resigned as president of the company and Garu Griffin resigned as treasurer, both effective March 31. The company said directors elected Chairman Nicholas A. Gallo III to the additional title of president and Chief Financial Officer Richard D. Mayo was elected treasurer. Reuter 
